JUDGES: Alena Poláčková;Branko Lubarda;Dmitry Dedov;Georgios A. Serghides;Helena Jäderblom;Luis López Guerra;Pere Pastor Vilanova
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant , the publishing house ORG ( автономная некоммерческая организация « Издательский дом “ LAW ” PERSON ) , is a NORP non - profit organisation . It was represented before the ORG by PERSON V. PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , Mr PERSON .
CARDINAL . NORP The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

CARDINAL . NORP The applicant is the publisher of GPE Guberniya , a regional DATE . The applicant and the newspaper are CARDINAL distinct legal persons . In DATE CARDINAL officials sued the newspaper for defamation over an article about their encounters with the law . On DATE the ORG found the article ’s allegations false and ordered the newspaper to issue a retraction but refused damages for emotional distress . On DATE ORG affirmed the judgment .
CARDINAL . According to ORG company register , in DATE the applicant was liquidated .
